description:
Kagura vs. Kamui. Gintoki vs. Takasugi. The long-awaited battles finally begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 5: Ceux qui protègent tout
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Five: Those Who Protect Against All Odds
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Go: Banji o Mamoru Mono-tachi
将軍暗殺篇五 万事を護る者達
